## Installation

You can install the development version of 'rmot' from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("traitecoevo/rmot")
```

## Demo

```{r example}
rmot_model("linear") |>
  rmot_assign_data(X = Loblolly$age,
                   Y = Loblolly$height,
                   N = nrow(Loblolly)) |>
  rmot_run()
```
